channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: When the Qubit Becomes One: Embracing Errors as Windows Into Reality
item.description: What if qubit errors arent failures but signposts pointing to flaws in our assumptions about the universe? By becoming one with the setting—the hardware, the noise, the cosmic context—we discover that every glitch is a clue to a deeper theory of reality.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
